TITLE: Documenting Tremor Checkbox Version History in Markdown
DESCRIPTION: A changelog documenting the version history of the Tremor checkbox component, listing changes from version 1.0.0 down to 0.0.1. Includes breaking changes related to Tailwind CSS v4, addition of tremor-id, layout shift fixes, and accessibility improvements.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tremorlabs/tremor/blob/main/src/components/Checkbox/changelog.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
# Tremor Checkbox Changelog

## 1.0.0

### Changes

- BREAKING CHANGE: Tailwind CSS v4

## 0.0.3

### Changes

- Chore: Add `tremor-id`

## 0.0.2

### Changes

- Fix: Layout shift

## 0.0.1

### Changes

- Fix: Add aria-hidden to svg
```

### Changes

### Changes
